title: Since after the update on April 11, my Pixel 2 refuses to charge.
content:
I noticed that my phone battery has been draining since last month for no reason even if I'm only on Kindle.  While charging and updating, the phone just completely discharge and never charged again.
I went to ubreakifix and they said that the charge is at 0.2 when it should be at 1.
They can't do anything without voiding the warranty.
